item.description: https://www.facebook.... WhenFriday.Time4:00pm until 6:00pm..Description Sign wave and handing out of lit, yard signs and bumper stickers. Gathering supporters names numbers and addresses. The downtown is well light and there should be a lot of last minute shoppers. If the group wants we can go to Ziggy's Pizza for some pizza afterwards. Invite everyone you think would want to help us. New Hampshire 250 Plainfield Rd, West Lebanon, NH
item.name: West Leb Sign Wave and Outreach
